name: @deboxsoft/webapp-components
description: component ui web base foundation framework.
author: Nurdiansyah

scripts.lint: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run stylelint -- --fix
scripts.check: npm run flow && npm run lint
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run cpPkgJson && npm run sass:copy
scripts.build: NODE_ENV=production npm run babel -- -q && npm run build:flow
scripts.predeploy: npm run check && npm run build
scripts.deploy:artifactory: npm run cpPkgJson && cd libs && yarn publish -- --registry http://devel.deboxserver:8081/artifactory/api/npm/npm-local
scripts.test: cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run flow && jest '.*/__tests__/.*(spec)\.jsx?$'
